title: LingPy. A Python Library for Historical Linguistics
description:
Cite the library as:

List, Johann-Mattis and Forkel, Robert (2021): LingPy. A Python library for historical linguistics. Version 2.6.9. URL: http://lingpy.org, DOI: https://zenodo.org/badge/latestdoi/5137/lingpy/lingpy. With contributions by Simon J. Greenhill, Tiago Tresoldi, Christoph Rzymski, Gereon Kaiping, Steven Moran, Peter Bouda, Johannes Dellert, Taraka Rama, Frank Nagel.
